dict.acceptation: 快速地流动；奔流；跑过；追逐；
沿…（方向）前进；指引航线；快跑；迅速移动；

sent.orig: The content of curriculum includes: Basic course, core course and elective course.
sent.trans: 本所之课程内容包含：基础课程、核心课程以及选修课程。

sent.orig: Of course, there will surely be setbacks and mistakes in the course of development.
sent.trans: 当然，在发展进程中不会没有曲折，没有缺点。

sent.orig: It is the complicated dynamic rheology course to mix and stir the course in vibration.
sent.trans: 振动拌和过程是复杂的动态流变过程。

sent.orig: During the term each student's progress in a given course is monitored by the course instructor.
sent.trans: 在学期中，学生的课程进度由担负这项课程的讲师掌握。
